text: Timurbugha (died 1475) was the seventeenth Burji Sultan of Mamluk Egypt, briefly ruling from late 1467 to early 1468 when he was deposed. He used the title of al-Malik al-Zāhir. ==References== ==Sources== * Category:1475 deaths Category:15th-century Mamluk sultans Category:Burji sultans
title: Timurbugha
